tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of submitting and creating workshops and labs for Oracle LiveLabs .

tutorials.title: Need to understand the status workflow in LiveLabs?
tutorials.description: Details of the status in LiveLabs and what comes next, who is responsible.

tutorials.title: LiveLabs FAQ
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to to use Oracle Learning Library (OLL) administration tools to manage links and how to add a link to an OHC page.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Submit New Workshop to Oracle LiveLabs
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to submit a new workshop request to LiveLabs

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Set Up GitHub and Install Tools
tutorials.description: This lab helps you configure your environment for developing labs and workshops using Markdown and GitHub.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Stay in Sync with GitHub Environment
tutorials.description: This lab shows you the Oracle LiveLabs GitHub folder structure how to fork and clone the repositories.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Develop Markdown Content
tutorials.description: This labs give you tips and tricks for editing and how to develop your lab (markdown) content using LiveLabs standards and accessibility for your workshops.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: QA Checks and Steps
tutorials.description: This lab prepares you for QA of your workshop, details to look for and adjust before publishing your workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Publish your Workshop
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the WMS steps to publish your workshop.

tutorials.title: (Optional) Lab 7: Develop LiveLabs Sprints
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create Sprint for LiveLabs

tutorials.title: (Optional): GitHub FAQ
tutorials.description: This lab shows provides tips for resolving GitHub issues

tutorials.title: (Optional): Generate SSH keys
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to generate SSH keys for authentification

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
